title: Bauer's Maximum Principle for Quasiconvex Functions. (arXiv:2305.04893v1 [econ.TH])
abstract: This note shows that in Bauer's maximum principle, the assumed convexity of the objective function can be relaxed to quasiconvexity.
context:
Title: Bauer's Maximum Principle for Quasiconvex Functions. (arXiv:2305.04893v1 [econ.TH])
Abstract: This note shows that in Bauer's maximum principle, the assumed convexity of the objective function can be relaxed to quasiconvexity.
translated_title: Bauer极值原理在拟凸函数中的应用
translated_abstract: 本文证明了在Bauer极值原理中，可以将目标函数的凸性假设放宽为拟凸性。
tldr: Bauer极值原理在拟凸函数中同样适用。
en_tdlr: Bauer's maximum principle can be applied to quasiconvex functions.
